original_text: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.
korean_text: 그의 오른손에 일곱 별이 있고 그의 입에서 좌우에 날선 검이 나오고 그 얼굴은 해가 힘있게 비치는 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: And he had in his right hand seven stars:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 오른손에 일곱 별을 가지고 있었고:

sentences.original_text: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입에서 날카로운 양날 검이 나왔고:

sentences.original_text: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 용모는 자기 힘으로 빛나는 태양과 같았다.
